data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Shangluo, Shaanxi, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shangluo, Shaanxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 177,652 believers in Shangluo, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Shangluo, Shaanxi, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Shangluo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hui, Muslim Chinese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Shangluo, Shaanxi, China. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we pray that the people of Shangluo, Shaanxi, China will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Shangluo a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
